member.name: T:Dragonbones.MathHelper
member.summary: A helper class filled with some useful math functions

member.name: M:Dragonbones.MathHelper.MovingAverage(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates an average for a stream of data
member.param: the new value to add to the set
the total number of values including the new one

member.name: M:Dragonbones.MathHelper.MovingAverage(System.Single,System.Single,System.Int64)
member.summary: Calculates an average for a stream of data
member.param: the new value to add to the set
the total number of values including the new one

member.name: M:Dragonbones.MathHelper.MovingAverage(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Calculates an average for a stream of data
member.param: the new value to add to the set
the total number of values including the new one

member.name: M:Dragonbones.MathHelper.MovingAverage(System.Double,System.Double,System.Int64)
member.summary: Calculates an average for a stream of data
member.param: the new value to add to the set
the total number of values including the new one

member.name: M:Dragonbones.MathHelper.MathShiftRem(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Fast Division and remainder if divisor is a power of two
member.param: the number to be divided by (must be a power of two)
the power of two the divisor is (or number of shifts left from 1)
